attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 15m, decreasing to 60% at 40m.

spell2.name: SUPERNOVA
spell2.description: Explode with cosmic fire to deal damage to enemies within range. Upon skill activation, all Flame Fields will transform into Flame Tornadoes, dealing extra damage

attributes.label: FLAME TORNADO RANGE
attributes.value: 3m spherical radius; 8m high capsule-shaped spell field.

spell3.name: BLAZING BLAST
spell3.description: Launch a fireball to create a Flame Field at the targeted area

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spherical spell field upon impact.

spell4.name: FLAMING METEOR
spell4.description: Dive towards the ground, dealing damage to enemies and detonating any Flame Fields hit

spell5.name: PLASMA BODY
spell5.description: Enter a state of accelerated ascent

spell6.name: PYRO-PRISON
spell6.description: Form a fire wall between Fire Fields to burn enemies

spell7.name: STORM SIBLINGS
spell7.description: The Invisible Woman taps into her powers, channeling Psionic Might to fortify the entire Fantastic Four team, granting damage resistance. Once activated, they can continually generate Bonus Health, making up for lost Health

spell8.name: PYROKINETIC ENERGY
spell8.description: Human Torch stores Pyrokinetic Energy in Spider-Man's suit, enabling him to unleash an Inferno Blast that sprays a fiery web while performing a backflip to create distance. The flames damage enemies and apply a Burn-Tracer. Detonating these Burn-Tracers inflicts Damage Over Time
